name: Mini Rollers
description: Mini Rollers is a rolling-ball platformer game, where players must race against the clock to get their balls to the goal. Roll, jump, and swing through a variety of obstacles, enemies, and challenges with 18 unique balls.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7-3930K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i7-3930K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB Storage: 4 GB available space
